iterGMRES_el.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /******************************************************************************
00002 * File      : iterGMRES_el.c                                                  *
00003 * Author    : Carlos Rosales Fernandez (carlos@ihpc.a-star.edu.sg)            *
00004 * Date      : 01-09-2006                                                      *
00005 * Revision  : 1.0                                                             *
00006 *******************************************************************************
00007 * DESCRIPTION                                                                 *
00008 * Iterative solution of the linear system Ax=B using GMRES.                   *
00009 * c : cosine in the Givens Rotation                                           *
00010 * s : sine in the Givens Rotation                                             *
00011 * h : Hessenberg matrix                                                       *
00012 * converge: (0) problem converges, (1) problem fails to converge within       *
00013 *           MAX_ITERS, (2) problem converging too slowly                      *
00014 ******************************************************************************/
00015 
00016 /******************************************************************************
00017 * COPYRIGHT & LICENSE INFORMATION                                             *
00018 *                                                                             *
00019 * Copyright 2006 Carlos Rosales Fernandez and The Institute of High           *
00020 * Performance Computing (A*STAR)                                              *
00021 *                                                                             *
00022 * This file is part of depSolver.                                             *
00023 *                                                                             *
00024 * depSolver is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify           *
00025 * it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by        *
00026 * the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or           *
00027 * (at your option) any later version.                                         *
00028 *                                                                             *
00029 * depSolver is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,                *
00030 * but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of              *
00031 * MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the               *
00032 * GNU General Public License for more details.                                *
00033 *                                                                             *
00034 * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License           *
00035 * along with depSolver; if not, write to the Free Software                    *
00036 * Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin St, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA  02110-1301  USA  *
00037 ******************************************************************************/

00039 #include "iterGMRES_el.h"
00040 
00041 int iterGMRES_el(unsigned int size, unsigned int iter1, unsigned int *iter2, 
00042                 double tolerance, double **A, double *x, double *B)
00043 {   
00044     int i, j, k, iters = 0, converge = 1;
00045     double norm, htmp, h1, h2; 
00046     double error[2];
00047     double *res, *c, *s;
00048     double **h, **krylov;
00049 
00050     s = doubleVector(MAX_ITERS,1);
00051     c = doubleVector(MAX_ITERS,1);
00052     res = doubleVector(MAX_ITERS,1);
00053     krylov = doublePointer(MAX_ITERS,1);
00054     h = doubleMatrix(MAX_ITERS,MAX_ITERS,1);
00055             
00056     /* Determine the first Krylov subspace vector */
00057     krylov[0] = doubleVector(size,0);              
00058     initRes_el(size,A,x,B,krylov[0]);   
00059     norm = L2Norm(size,krylov[0]);
00060     for(i = 0; i < size; i++) krylov[0][i] = krylov[0][i]/norm; 
00061     res[0] = norm;
00062     error[0] = norm;
00063     
00064     /* If initial guess is accurate exit */
00065     if(error[0] < tolerance) return 0;
00066     
00067     /* GMRES iterations starts */       
00068     for(i = 0; i < MAX_ITERS; i++){
00069         iters++;
00070         
00071         /* Determine Krylov[i+1] vector using Krylov[i] vector */
00072         krylov[i+1] = doubleVector(size,0);
00073         matVectProd_el(A,krylov[i],krylov[i+1]);
00074         norm = L2Norm(size,krylov[i+1]);
00075 
00076         /* orthogonalization of krylov[i+1] w.r.t. all previous krylov[i] */
00077         for(j = 0; j <= i; j++){
00078             h[j][i] = dotProd(size,krylov[j],krylov[i+1]);
00079             for(k = 0; k < size; k++)
00080                 krylov[i+1][k] = krylov[i+1][k] - h[j][i]*krylov[j][k];
00081         }
00082     
00083         h[i+1][i] = L2Norm(size,krylov[i+1]);   
00084         if(h[i+1][i] != 0.0)
00085             for(j = 0; j < size; j++) krylov[i+1][j] = krylov[i+1][j]/h[i+1][i];
00086 
00087         /* Compute the Givens rotation that reduces the    */ 
00088         /* Hessenberg matrix to an upper triangular matrix */
00089         if(i > 0){
00090             for(j = 0; j <= (i-1); j++){
00091                 h1 = c[j]*h[j][i] + s[j]*h[j+1][i];
00092                 h2 = -s[j]*h[j][i] + c[j]*h[j+1][i];
00093         
00094                 h[j][i] = h1;
00095                 h[j+1][i] = h2;
00096             }
00097         }
00098         
00099         /* Perform the current Givens rotation */
00100         htmp = h[i+1][i]/h[i][i];
00101         if(norm != 0.0){
00102             c[i] = 1.0/sqrt(1.0 + htmp*htmp);
00103             s[i] = c[i]*htmp;
00104                 
00105             h[i][i] = c[i]*h[i][i] + s[i]*h[i+1][i];
00106             h[i+1][i] = 0.0;
00107 
00108             res[i+1] = -s[i]*res[i];
00109             res[i] = c[i]*res[i];
00110         }   
00111     
00112         /* Update the error and test for convergence */ 
00113         error[1] = fabs(res[i+1]);
00114         fprintf(fg,"%8d%25.4e\n", MAX_ITERS*(iter1-1)+iters, error[1]);
00115         
00116         if(error[1] < tolerance){
00117             converge = 0;
00118             break;
00119         }
00120         else if(fabs((error[1] - error[0])/error[0]) < 1.0e-6*tolerance)
00121             errorHandler("CONVERGENCE RATE TOO SLOW");
00122         else error[0] = error[1];   
00123     }
00124     
00125     /* Solve the triangle system of equations for the weights */
00126     for(i = iters-1; i >= 0; i--){
00127         for(j = i+1; j <= iters; j++) res[i] -= h[i][j]*res[j];     
00128         res[i] = res[i]/h[i][i];
00129     }
00130 
00131     /* Return the solution in x */
00132     for(i = 0; i < size; i++)
00133         for(j = 0; j < iters; j++) x[i] += res[j]*krylov[j][i];  
00134             
00135     *iter2 = iters;
00136     
00137     /* Free dynamically allocated memory */
00138     free(s);
00139     free(c);
00140     free(res);
00141     freeDoubleMatrix(h,MAX_ITERS);
00142     freeDoublePointer(krylov,iters + 1);
00143     
00144     return converge;
00145 }
